changeSet.sql: insert into os_consent_statements (identifier, code, statement, activity_status) select os_consent_stmts_seq.nextval, concat('C', os_consent_stmts_seq.currval), t0.statement, 'Active' from ( select distinct statement from catissue_consent_tier where activity_status = 'Active' ) t0

changeSet.author: mdnasim
changeSet.id: Move existing CP consent tier statement text to coded consent statement table
changeSet.sql:
set @row := 0;
insert into os_consent_statements (code, statement, activity_status) select concat('C', @row := @row + 1), t0.statement, 'Active' from ( select distinct statement from catissue_consent_tier where activity_status = 'Active' ) t0

changeSet.author: mdnasim
changeSet.sql: update catissue_consent_tier tier set consent_stmt_id = ( select identifier from os_consent_statements stmt where stmt.statement = tier.statement ) where activity_status = 'Active'

changeSet.sql: create or replace view consent_tier_view as ( select tier.identifier as identifier, resp.coll_prot_reg_id as cpr_id, stmt.statement as statement, resp.response as response from catissue_consent_tier tier inner join catissue_consent_tier_response resp on resp.consent_tier_id = tier.identifier inner join os_consent_statements stmt on stmt.identifier = tier.consent_stmt_id where resp.coll_prot_reg_id is not null )
